price: ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߡߊߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߞߐ߲ߞߐ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊ߬ߝߎߟߋ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊ߬ߛߘߌ ߘߐ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
